name: modular-react-platform
description: Modular React Platform PoC with Module Federation 2.0

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:shared-components" "npm run dev:shared-data" "npm run dev:shell" "npm run dev:content" "npm run dev:reports" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:hubs"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:shared: npm run build:shared-components && npm run build:shared-data
scripts.build:apps: npm run build:shell && npm run build:content && npm run build:reports && npm run build:user && npm run build:hubs
scripts.install:packages: npm run install:shared && npm run install:apps
scripts.install:shared: cd packages/shared-components && npm install && cd ../shared-data && npm install
scripts.install:apps: cd packages/top-level-shell && npm install && cd ../reports-tab && npm install && cd ../user-tab && npm install && cd ../hubs-tab && npm install && cd ../content-platform/shell && npm install && cd ../files-folders && npm install
